sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Ranked #1 in Its Category on Pensions & Investments’ 2025 Best Places to Work in Money Management List, Marking Fifth Year of Recognition
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor has been recognized for the fifth consecutive year as one of Pensions & Investments’ Best Places to Work in Money Management, ranking #1 in the Major Employers (500-999 U.S. Employees) category. President Jon Levin emphasized that this achievement reflects the team's dedication and commitment to fostering a culture of teamwork, partnership, and integrity. The recognition is based on surveys that assess workplace policies, practices, and employee engagement, highlighting GCM Grosvenor's success in creating an exceptional workplace.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor: Private Markets Seem To Be Thawing (NASDAQ:GCMG)
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor Inc. (GCMG) appears undervalued based on its EV/AUM multiple compared to historical averages and peers, indicating a potential investment opportunity. The company is experiencing robust AUM growth, signaling a recovery in capital markets and the potential for increased carried interest as market liquidity improves. GCMG benefits from operating leverage on stable SG&A, leading to strong profit and margin growth, making it an interesting bet as private equity transactions resume after a stagnant period.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Announces $100M Equity Distribution Deal
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor (GCMG) has entered into an Equity Distribution Agreement with Morgan Stanley & Co. LLC to sell up to $100 million of its Class A common stock through an at-the-market offering. The proceeds will be used for general working capital and corporate purposes. TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, assesses GCMG as Neutral, noting strong earnings and cash flow are balanced against bearish technical indicators and a high P/E ratio, suggesting potential overvaluation despite promising revenue growth.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor's (NASDAQ:GCMG) Shareholders Will Receive A Bigger Dividend Than Last Year
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor Inc. (NASDAQ:GCMG) is increasing its dividend to $0.12, resulting in a 4.3% yield. The dividend is comfortably covered by both cash flow and earnings, with a forecast 17.5% rise in earnings per share next year. Despite a relatively short dividend payment history, the company has shown strong growth in distributions and earnings.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Enters Equity Distribution Agreement
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor Inc. (GCMG) announced an Equity Distribution Agreement with Morgan Stanley on November 17, 2025, allowing for the sale of up to $100 million in Class A common stock through "at the market offerings." The proceeds are intended for working capital and general corporate purposes, with Morgan Stanley receiving a 2.5% commission on gross sales. The agreement was detailed in an SEC Filing.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor (GCMG): Is the Stock Undervalued After Recent Share Price Fluctuations?
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor (GCMG) has experienced stock fluctuations, with a slight 2% decline over the past month, despite steady revenue growth and strong multi-year gains. Analysts suggest the stock is undervalued, projecting a fair value significantly higher than its current trading price, driven by expansion into infrastructure and alternative strategies. However, an alternative Discounted Cash Flow model indicates the stock might be trading above its calculated fair value, prompting investors to consider if optimism about future earnings is already priced in.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Inc. (GCMG) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor Inc. (GCMG) reported Q3 earnings of $0.19 per share, exceeding the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.17, and revenues of $134.97 million, surpassing estimates by 2.38%. Despite these strong results, the company's shares have underperformed the S&P 500 year-to-date, and it currently holds a Zacks Rank #4 (Sell) due to unfavorable estimate revisions. Investors are advised to consider the company's earnings outlook and industry performance, with Franklin Resources (BEN) from the same industry also preparing to report its Q3 results.

feed.title: CION Investments and GCM Grosvenor Announce Launch of the CION Grosvenor Infrastructure Fund with $240 Million Invested in Infrastructure Assets
feed.summary: CION Investments and GCM Grosvenor have launched the CION Grosvenor Infrastructure Fund (CGIF), an evergreen interval fund providing individual investors access to GCM Grosvenor’s institutional private infrastructure platform. The fund debuted with a $240 million portfolio across 43 infrastructure assets and an additional $82 million in committed capital. CGIF aims to offer diversification, potential inflation protection, and lower volatility through investments in traditional and new infrastructure sectors.

feed.title: Insider Sale: Director at $CART Sells 1,014 Shares - Quiver Quantitative
feed.summary: Fidji Simo, a director at CART, sold 1,014 shares of the company for an estimated $40,560 on October 16, 2025. This sale represents approximately 0.2% of their holdings, leaving them with 569,742 shares. The article also details recent insider trading activity, hedge fund movements, congressional stock trading, and analyst ratings and price targets for CART.

feed.title: Transcript : GCM Grosvenor Inc. - Analyst/Investor Day - MarketScreener
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor Inc. held its 2025 Investor Day, featuring presentations by executives like Stacie Selinger, Head of Investor Relations. The article also provides recent financial data, including the stock's market performance and dividend announcements. It highlights key corporate news, such as a recent dividend increase to $0.12 per share and several strategic acquisitions and funding rounds.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Raises Quarterly Dividend to $0.12 a Share, Payable Dec. 15 to Shareholders of Record Dec. 1 - MarketScreener
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor Inc. announced a quarterly dividend increase to $0.12 per share. This dividend will be payable on December 15 to shareholders of record as of December 1. This news follows an earlier announcement of a dividend increase and an investor day presentation.

feed.title: GCMG Increases Dividend Ahead of Investor Day - GuruFocus
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor (GCMG) announced an increase in its quarterly cash dividend from 11 cents to 12 cents per share, ahead of its Investor Day event on October 15, 2025. The global alternative asset management firm, despite experiencing a 3-year revenue growth decline, showcases strong operating and net margins, and good liquidity, though its debt-to-equity ratio is negative and insider selling has been observed. Valuation metrics suggest potential undervaluation, with a 'Buy' consensus from analysts and technical indicators pointing to oversold territory.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Increases Quarterly Dividend - TipRanks
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor (GCMG) announced an increase in its quarterly cash dividend to $0.12 per share, up $0.01 from the previous dividend, payable on December 15, 2025. This news followed their Investor Day event on October 15, 2025, where a presentation was shared with public shareholders. TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, rates GCMG as Neutral, citing strong earnings and cash flow balanced against high leverage and a negative equity position.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor posts investor day presentation and announces dividend increase - MarketScreener
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor Inc. announced that it has posted its investor day presentation and is increasing its dividend. The company, an alternative asset management solutions provider, specializes in private and public market investments across various strategies including Infrastructure, Real Estate, and Alternative Credit. This news follows a series of recent activities including earnings results and buyback plan updates.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Posts Investor Day Presentation and Announces Dividend Increase - MarketScreener
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor announced that it has posted its investor day presentation online and will be holding an Investor Day event on October 15, 2025. The company also announced an increase in its quarterly cash dividend from $0.11 to $0.12 per share, or $0.48 annualized, effective in the fourth quarter of 2025. This news comes as GCM Grosvenor details its long-term strategy, business drivers, investment initiatives, and financial outlook.

feed.title: $0.12 quarterly dividend announced — GCM Grosvenor posts Investor Day presentation Oct 15, 2025 - Stock Titan
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor (Nasdaq: GCMG) announced an increase in its quarterly cash dividend from $0.11 to $0.12 per Class A share, effective starting Q4 2025. The company also posted its Investor Day presentation and will hold the event on October 15, 2025, featuring presentations from senior management regarding its long-term strategy and financial outlook. The Investor Day will be conducted both virtually and in-person, with in-person attendance being invitation-only.

feed.title: $800M Fund Backing: Former Investcorp PE Head Dave Tayeh Launches Middle Market Firm TCG with Jay Alix
feed.summary: Former Investcorp PE head Dave Tayeh and Jay Alix have launched Tayeh Capital Group (TCG), a new private equity firm focused on rapidly growing middle-market business services companies. The firm is backed by GCM Grosvenor's Elevate Fund, which recently completed fundraising with nearly $800 million in committed capital. TCG aims to partner with founders and management teams, offering a collaborative approach and access to a world-class network to accelerate business growth.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor to Host Investor Day on October 15, 2025, in New York City
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor (Nasdaq: GCMG) will host an Investor Day in New York City on October 15, 2025, to present its long-term strategy, financial outlook, and key business drivers. The event will feature CEO Michael Sacks, President Jon Levin, and CFO Pamela Bentley, and will be accessible both in-person (by invitation) and via a live webcast for broader investor participation. Presentation materials and a recording will be made available.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor to Host Investor Day on October 15, 2025, in New York City
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor will host its Investor Day in New York City on October 15, 2025, to present its long-term strategy and financial outlook. The event will feature key executives, including CEO Michael Sacks and CFO Pamela Bentley, and will be available both in-person (by invitation only) and via live webcast. The firm manages approximately $86 billion in assets and specializes in alternative investments.

feed.title: Wilshire Indexes and GCM Grosvenor Launch Private Market Infrastructure Index, Laying Foundation for Broader Strategic Alliance
feed.summary: Wilshire Indexes and GCM Grosvenor have launched the FT Wilshire Private Markets Infrastructure Index, a new benchmark designed to provide transparency and a reliable reference point for investors in open-ended infrastructure funds. This collaboration aims to fill a void in the market by offering a comprehensive benchmark and is expected to lead to investable vehicles tracking the Index in the coming months. The partnership also lays the groundwork for future alternative investment indices and products.

feed.title: CION Investments and GCM Grosvenor Announce Launch of the CION Grosvenor Infrastructure Fund with $240 Million Invested in Infrastructure Assets
feed.summary: CION Investments and GCM Grosvenor have launched the CION Grosvenor Infrastructure Fund (CGIF), with an initial $240 million invested across 43 infrastructure assets and an additional $82 million in committed capital. The evergreen interval fund provides individual investors access to GCM Grosvenor’s institutional private infrastructure platform, focusing on diversified private assets across various infrastructure sectors. This collaboration aims to offer individual investors access to private markets with an attractive asset class and a suitable fund structure.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Announces Final Close of Inaugural Elevate Fund with Nearly $800 Million Committed Capital
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor has announced the final close of its inaugural Elevate Fund, securing nearly $800 million in committed capital. This fund, launched in 2023, focuses on making seed investments in small and emerging private equity firms specializing in lower- and middle-market buyout strategies. Notable investors include CalPERS, which contributed $500 million, and the fund has already made two investments with more anticipated in 2025.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Elevate Fund Holds Final Close at Nearly $800 Million, the Largest Debut Private Equity Seeding Fund of Its Kind, Signaling Strong Continued Support for Small and Emerging Firm Founders
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor's inaugural Elevate Fund has successfully completed its final close, raising nearly $800 million in committed capital. This fund, launched in 2023, focuses on making catalytic seed investments in small and emerging private equity firms specializing in lower- and middle-market buyout strategies. Elevate builds on GCM Grosvenor's extensive track record of supporting small and emerging managers, reinforcing its commitment to fostering innovation and growth in the private equity landscape.

feed.title: Moderne Ventures Closes over $230M for MV Fund III, Scaling its Modern Approach to Venture Investing
feed.summary: Moderne Ventures announced it has raised over $230 million for MV Core Fund III, bringing its total assets under management to over $500 million. The firm, led by Constance Freedman and Liza Benson, specializes in real estate, finance, insurance, and sustainability, and is known for its unique approach of connecting portfolio companies with customers through its Moderne Passport program. With a diverse team and a track record of top-tier returns, Moderne Ventures plans to expand further with its first Growth Fund this year.

feed.title: Benchstrength Closes $62M Early-Stage Venture Capital Fund
feed.summary: Benchstrength, a NYC-based venture capital firm founded by former General Catalyst investors Ken Chenault Jr. and John Monagle, has announced the close of its first $62 million early-stage fund. The firm focuses on investing in pre-seed and seed stage technology companies across various sectors, particularly those with historically overlooked founders. The fund's investors include prominent institutions like the Ford Foundation, GCM Grosvenor, and Goldman Sachs Asset Management, as well as notable individual investors.

feed.title: AGT Food and Ingredients Inc. Completes Sale of Mobil Grain Ltd. to GCM Grosvenor | GCMG Stock News
feed.summary: AGT Food and Ingredients Inc. has sold Mobil Grain Ltd. and its associated shortline rail and bulk handling infrastructure to GCM Grosvenor. This deal secures a 20-year agreement for AGT to continue using the infrastructure for its global supply chain, benefiting Saskatchewan's agricultural sector. The transaction, expected to close in late 2024 or early 2025, aims to enhance infrastructure growth and return significant capital to AGT.

feed.title: Analysts’ Top Financial Picks: GCM Grosvenor (GCMG), F.N.B. (FNB)
feed.summary: Two analysts weighed in on GCM Grosvenor (GCMG) and F.N.B. (FNB) with bullish sentiments. William Blair analyst Adam Klauber reiterated a Buy rating on GCM Grosvenor, while Bank of America Securities analyst Brandon Berman reiterated a Buy rating on F.N.B. Both stocks have a "Moderate Buy" or "Strong Buy" consensus rating among analysts, with significant upside potential.

feed.title: Axxes Capital Launches Interval Fund to Provide Accredited Investors Access to the Private Equity Asset Class
feed.summary: Axxes Capital has launched the Axxes Private Markets Fund, an interval fund designed to offer accredited investors access to private equity co-investments and secondaries. The Fund leverages the expertise of GCM Grosvenor and Fisher Lynch Capital, providing an investor-friendly vehicle with low minimums, daily purchasing, and quarterly liquidity. This initiative aims to democratize access to private markets, traditionally reserved for large institutions, through a simplified and efficient structure.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor Closes $882m Infrastructure Fund
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor has successfully closed its CIS III fund with $882 million in committed capital, a 37% increase from its predecessor. This brings the firm's total infrastructure fundraising to $7.8 billion since 2021, driven by a global sourcing strategy and flexible investment approaches. The fund aims to diversify opportunities across transportation, energy transition, digital infrastructure, battery storage, and e-commerce logistics through co-investments, secondaries, and direct investments.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor backs new healthcare firm Invidia
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor has made a strategic investment in Invidia Capital Management, a new healthcare firm founded by former Goldman Sachs Partner Jo Natauri. Invidia plans to invest between $100 million and $300 million in various healthcare subsectors, focusing on upper-middle market opportunities. The firm has assembled a pedigreed team with extensive experience in healthcare investing and operations.

feed.title: NY State Pension Continues to Dial Back Its Stock Exposure
feed.summary: The New York State Common Retirement Fund has significantly reduced its public equity holdings by over $4.4 billion in 2023, shifting investments towards private equity and emerging managers. This strategic move also includes substantial commitments to affordable housing projects and various private funds in different sectors like business services, healthcare, and real estate. The fund's actions reflect an ongoing trend to diversify its portfolio away from traditional public equities.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor to Announce Third Quarter 2023 Financial Results and Host Investor Conference Call on November 8, 2023
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor announced it will release its third-quarter 2023 financial results on Wednesday, November 8, 2023. The company will also host a webcast and conference call on the same day at 9:30 a.m. ET to discuss the results and provide a business update to investors. GCM Grosvenor is a global alternative asset management solutions provider with approximately $76 billion in assets under management.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor to Announce Second Quarter 2023 Financial Results and Host Investor Conference Call on August 9, 2023
feed.summary: GCM Grosvenor announced that it will release its second-quarter 2023 financial results on Wednesday, August 9, 2023. The company will also host a webcast and conference call on the same day at 10:00 a.m. ET to discuss the results and provide a business update. GCM Grosvenor is a global alternative asset management solutions provider with approximately $75 billion in assets under management.

feed.title: Ethos Real Estate Closes Second Multifamily Acquisition as Part of Joint Venture with GCM Grosvenor Programs
feed.summary: Ethos Real Estate has acquired the Residences at Woodlake for $76 million, transforming the 276-unit property in Los Angeles into deed-restricted affordable housing. This marks their second purchase in a joint venture with GCM Grosvenor, with 50% of units reserved for families earning up to 80% of AMI and 10% for those earning up to 60% of AMI for 55 years. The initiative aims to address California's critical affordable housing shortage through an innovative public-private partnership.

feed.title: Caliche Development Partners II Announces its First Acquisitions Following $268 Million Capital Commitment from Orion Infrastructure Capital and GCM Grosvenor
feed.summary: Caliche Development Partners II has announced its first acquisitions, Golden Triangle Storage, Inc. and the proposed acquisition of Central Valley Gas Storage, following a $268 million capital commitment from Orion Infrastructure Capital and GCM Grosvenor. This partnership aims to target underground storage and sequestration assets in North America to support energy transition initiatives. The total acquisition cost for both assets, along with working capital, is $186 million, with the GTS transaction already closed and CVGS expected to close in 2023.

feed.title: Strategic Recapitalization of ‘Several Hundred Million’ Values Exterro at Over $1 Billion
feed.summary: Exterro, a legal technology company specializing in e-discovery, governance, risk, and compliance software, has completed a strategic recapitalization providing "several hundred million" in new funding at a valuation exceeding $1 billion, achieving unicorn status. This funding, supported by Leeds Equity Partners and other institutional investors, will fuel Exterro's growth through acquisitions, product development, and geographic expansion. CEO Bobby Balachandran indicated that an IPO is still a possibility for 2023, with this recapitalization serving as a pre-round to strengthen the company for public markets.

feed.title: Blakes assists three M&A deals in finance, infrastructure, mining sectors
feed.summary: Blake, Cassels & Graydon (Blakes) acted as legal counsel in three significant M&A deals this week across finance, infrastructure, and mining sectors. These deals include the Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan Board’s acquisition of HomeEquity Bank, Novacap Investments’ sale of Hallcon, and the sale of Alexco Resource to Hecla Mining Company. Torys and Osler, Hoskin & Harcourt also served as Canadian legal advisors in some of these transactions.

feed.title: GCM Grosvenor to Join Horizon as New Strategic Investor
feed.summary: Horizon, a fiber-optic broadband company, has announced that GCM Grosvenor will acquire a significant ownership stake, joining existing investor Novacap TMT. This strategic partnership aims to accelerate Horizon's growth plan, focusing on expanding its fiber network and services in Ohio and the greater Midwest region. GCM Grosvenor's expertise in telecom and fiber-optic infrastructure, coupled with its Labor Impact Strategy, is expected to enhance Horizon's expansion efforts, including its Fiber to the Home initiatives.

feed.title: Class of 2021 NextGens
feed.summary: This article features Panayiotis Lambropoulos, Portfolio Manager at the Employees Retirement System of Texas (ERS), as one of the Class of 2021 NextGens. It highlights his work in developing the PAAMCO Launchpad, an emerging manager platform for hedge funds, and includes his insights on diversity in finance, cryptocurrencies, the post-pandemic economic landscape, and future investment trends. The article also lists other individuals recognized in the 2021 NextGens class.
